instructions:
This is the Offical character sheet for the 'Free Spacer RPG' by 'Random Alien Games', version 1.00.

* The sheet has two tabs: one for the the ship and one for crewmembers.
* It has a sheet roll for each skill, which lets you choose the specialty used.
* The 'Ship Configuration' now have a dynamic representation.

 [Free Spacer Homepage](http://www.freespacer.com/) - [Sheet Wiki Page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Free_Spacer)
